attributes.review: I wanted to download the app but when I opened it the app would malfunction and turn off! But the worst part is that the app slowly ruined my phone. Now my phone won’t even turn on! DONT get the app

attributes.review: DO NOT GET THIS APP. Absolutely a waste of time, not actually useful, taking up space. Why would anyone get this app? He’s racist, sexist, homophobic, transphobic and orange I don’t get it but some people do. In conclusion, I hope he gets voted out thank you.

attributes.review: So I got this application because I wanted to support my used to favorite president when I got a notification to send my address for a meet and greet so of course I did, days passed and then I got HUNDREDS of packages of Yellow/blond wigs for men then HUNDREDS of empty orange spray tans😡 so DO NOT GET THIS APPLICATION OR SUPPORT THE WALKING CHEETO

attributes.review: First where do I start... took 6 days to download then it wiped all my information and subscribed me to emails from a website I had never heard of 🤬🤬🤬🤬 this caused me to get angry so I threw a rock at a trump 2020 sign. 😤 gainzzz😤
attributes.title: This app ruined my life.

attributes.review: This app is so bad it can never do anything right. It’s constantly glitches and took forever to download I feel like it’s going to put a virus on to my phone
